paper_abstract: Current buildings' performance assessment tools are deficient in their ability to Integrate and process building monitoring data to generate actionable information that can assist in achieving a higher level of building performance Therefore, this paper addresses this problem by proposing the design and implementation of a multi-dimensional data analysis concept for building monitoring data Firstly, the development of the multi-dimensional performance data model is described based on data warehouse technology. Secondly, a dedicated graphical user interface is introduced bringing the benefits of the multi-dimensional model to different stakeholders. Finally, the advantages of multi-dimensional performance data management is demonstrated in a real life case study for on-site and e-service performance management (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd All rights reserved
paper_title: Multi-dimensional building performance data management for continuous commissioning
